steps.plaintext: Go to the second floor of the tavern and wait on the seat by the railing
steps.markdown: Go to the second floor of the ◀tavern▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Angel%27s_Share▷ and wait on the seat by the railing

steps.plaintext: Go to the first floor of the tavern and find the stranger
steps.markdown: Go to the first floor of the tavern and find the stranger

steps.plaintext: Go to the Temple of the Falcon

substeps.plaintext: Talk to Dainsleif to progress the quest. Co-Op Mode will be disabled until the story domain has been cleared.
substeps.markdown: Talk to Dainsleif to progress the quest. ◀Co-Op Mode▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Co-Op_Mode▷ will be disabled until the ◀story domain▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Domains#Story_Domains▷ has been cleared.

steps.plaintext: Enter the Temple of the Falcon
steps.markdown: Enter the Temple of the Falcon

substeps.plaintext: Enter Temple of the Falcon's Quest Domain: Abyssal Traces

steps.plaintext: Look for clues related to the Abyss Order in Wolvendom (0/2)
steps.markdown: Look for clues related to the ◀Abyss Order▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Abyss_Order▷ in ◀Wolvendom▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Wolvendom▷ (0/2)

substeps.plaintext: A Cryo Abyss Mage and some Hilichurls will appear when you interact with the northern bonfire.
substeps.markdown: A ◀Cryo Abyss Mage▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Cryo_Abyss_Mage▷ and some ◀Hilichurls▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hilichurls▷ will appear when you interact with the northern bonfire.

substeps.plaintext: A Pyro Abyss Mage and some Hilichurls are camping at the southern bonfire.
substeps.markdown: A ◀Pyro Abyss Mage▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Pyro_Abyss_Mage▷ and some ◀Hilichurls▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hilichurls▷ are camping at the southern bonfire.

substeps.plaintext: The first group consists of a Hydro Abyss Mage and some Hilichurls. Another Hydro Abyss Mage, Hydro Samachurl, and 2 Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurls will appear after the first group is defeated.
substeps.markdown: The first group consists of a ◀Hydro Abyss Mage▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hydro_Abyss_Mage▷ and some ◀Hilichurls▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hilichurls▷. Another ◀Hydro Abyss Mage▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hydro_Abyss_Mage▷, ◀Hydro Samachurl▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Hydro_Samachurl▷, and 2 ◀Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurls▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Wooden_Shieldwall_Mitachurl▷ will appear after the first group is defeated.
